title: Retrieve a note
description: Retrieves the note for a listing, if there is one.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to retrieve the note for.

query.name: is_purchase_id
query.description: Indicates whether the listing ID is actually a purchase ID. Defaults to false.

query.name: offer_id
query.description: The ID of the offer associated with the note. Defaults to 0, which indicates the note to retrieve is not associated with a fixed price offer.

returns.description: <NoteResponse> Whether the operation was successful and the note details.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: OfferId
fields.description: The ID of the fixed price offer, or 0 if the note is not associated with a fixed price offer.
